title.value: IEC 61966-2-1: Colour measurement and management - Part 2-1: Colour management - Default RGB colour space - sRGB

name.value: International Electrotechnical Commission; 3 rue de VarembÃ©, PO Box 131, CH-1211 Geneva 20, Switzerland

description.value:
IEC 61966-2-1:1999 is the official specification of sRGB. It provides viewing environment, encoding, and colorimetric details.
For more information, please see https://webstore.iec.ch/publication/6168

comment.value: This is the URL endorsed by the HTA and is considered authoritative.
